prayAjaqtvaM ~MyasyaiqvaM ~MviqduSha#H prayAqjA iqjyantEq praiByO lOqkEByOq BrAtRu#vyAnnudatE &BiqkrAma#M juhOtyaqBiji#tyaiq yO vai pra#yAqjAnA$M mithuqnaM ~MvEdaq pra praqjayA# paqSuBi# rmithuqnai rjA#yatE saqmidhO# baqhvIri#va yajatiq 
tanUqnapA#taqmEka#miva mithuqnaM tadiqDO baqhvIri#va yajati baqrq.hirEka#miva mithuqnaM tadEqtadvai pra#yAqjAnA$M mithuqnaM ~Mya EqvaM ~MvEdaq pra - [  ]  4
